definition: "sage of poetry", epithet of Du Fu 杜甫[Du4 Fu3]
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
poem/CL:首[shou3]/poetry/verse
holy/sacred/saint/sage

sentences.english: Of the many Chinese poets in Tang Dynasty, who was known as the "Saint of Poetry"?
sentences.chinese: 中国唐朝诗人辈出，请问被称为“诗圣”的是哪一位？

sentences.english: O master poet, I have sat down at thy feet.
sentences.chinese: 呵，诗圣，我已经拜倒在你的脚前。
